title: Metabolic Flux Network Analysis
text: Metabolic Flux Network Analysis (MFNA) designed interpret complicated isotopomers data. construct metabolic reaction network based KEGG reaction database, simulate atom transfer reaction trace isotope source isotopomers. Therefore MFNA take known metabolic reaction consideration perform metabolic flux network analysis. Now competent discovering reaction path given isotopic tracer isotopomer. still developing integrate MSIP MFNA calculate metabolic flux.

Zoom click one peak show information, annotation isotopic distribution fragments, right-bottom pie-plot show corresponding ratio isotopic distribution.
